title: Increased API Response Times
description: Some users are experiencing slower API response times in the NYC1 region.

updates.message: We are investigating reports of increased latency.
We are aware of degraded performance and are looking into it.

title: Complete Service Outage
description: All services in Bern region are currently unavailable. Network connectivity issue affecting the entire datacenter.

updates.message: Our datacenter partner is investigating a network infrastructure failure. Updates will be provided every 15 minutes.
We are aware of a complete service outage in the Bern region and are investigating urgently.
